```{R}

vow_win = c(vow_data$GP.WR/100 * vow_data$X..GP)
vow_loss = c(vow_data$X..GP - vow_win)

plot(vow_loss, vow_win, type = 'p')
abline(a = 0, b = sum(vow_win, na.rm = T)/sum(vow_loss, na.rm = T))

```

```{R}

mid_win = c(mid_data$GP.WR/100 * mid_data$X..GP)

```

